mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_ORD WHERE ORD_STS = 5

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT O.ORD_STS ORD_STS , SUM(RI.RI_URLS) AS SUM_RI_URLS FROM TB_RLS_INSP RI JOIN TB_ORD_ITM OI ON (RI.OI_NO = OI.OI_NO) JOIN TB_ORD O ON (OI.ORD_NO = O.ORD_NO) GROUP BY O.ORD_NO ) SQ WHERE SQ.ORD_STS = 5 AND SQ.SUM_RI_URLS > 0

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT O.ORD_STS ORD_STS , O.ORD_SHP_CAT AS ORD_CAT FROM TB_PAC PA JOIN TB_ORD_ITM OI ON (PA.OI_NO = OI.OI_NO) JOIN TB_ORD O ON (OI.ORD_NO = O.ORD_NO) GROUP BY O.ORD_NO ) SQ WHERE SQ.ORD_STS = 5 AND SQ.ORD_CAT='긴급'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT O.ORD_STS ORD_STS , O.ORD_SHP_CAT AS ORD_CAT FROM TB_PAC PA JOIN TB_ORD_ITM OI ON (PA.OI_NO = OI.OI_NO) JOIN TB_ORD O ON (OI.ORD_NO = O.ORD_NO) GROUP BY O.ORD_NO ) SQ WHERE SQ.ORD_STS = 5 AND SQ.ORD_CAT='일반'

SELECT R.RLS_NO, I.ITM_NAME, I.ITM_CODE, PI.PIC_NO, PI.PIC_QTY , RI.RI_QTY, IFNULL(RI.RI_URLS, ' ') RI_URLS, IFNULL(PA.PAC_URLS, ' ') PAC_URLS, V.V_NAME, O.ORD_SHP_DEST , O.ORD_SHP_CAT, O.ORD_SHP_WAY, E.EMP_NAME RI_EMP_NAME , RI.RI_RLS_PRT_DT, RI.RI_RCPT_PRT_DT, RI.RI_DT, IFNULL(PA.PAC_BX_QTY, ' ') PAC_BX_QTY , R.RLS_EMP_NAME, R.RLS_SHP_CPN, R.RLS_RLS_IVC_CODE, IFNULL(RI.RI_NT, ' ') RI_NT , IFNULL(PA.PAC_NT, ' ') PAC_NT, IFNULL(R.RLS_RLS_NT, ' ') RLS_RLS_NT , R.RLS_DN, O.ORD_NO, C.CLT_NAME, RI.OI_NO FROM TB_ORD O JOIN (SELECT RLS.RLS_NO RLS_NO, RLS.ORD_NO RLS_ORD_NO, EMP.EMP_NAME RLS_EMP_NAME , RLS_SHP_CPN, RLS.RLS_IVC_CODE RLS_RLS_IVC_CODE, RLS.RLS_NT RLS_RLS_NT , RLS_DN FROM TB_RLS RLS JOIN TB_EMP EMP ON (RLS.EMP_ID=EMP.EMP_ID) ) R ON (O.ORD_NO=R.RLS_ORD_NO) RIGHT JOIN TB_ORD_ITM OI ON (O.ORD_NO=OI.ORD_NO) JOIN TB_ITM I ON (OI.ITM_CODE=I.ITM_CODE) JOIN TB_VND V ON (I.V_NO=V.V_NO) JOIN TB_RLS_INSP RI ON (OI.OI_NO=RI.OI_NO) JOIN TB_PIC PI ON (OI.OI_NO=PI.OI_NO) JOIN TB_PAC PA ON (OI.OI_NO=PA.OI_NO) JOIN TB_EMP E ON (RI.EMP_ID=E.EMP_ID) JOIN TB_CLT C ON (C.CLT_NO=O.CLT_NO)
AND O.ORD_SHP_CAT='일반'
AND O.ORD_SHP_CAT='긴급'
AND O.ORD_SHP_WAY='오스템'
AND O.ORD_SHP_WAY='합배송'
AND R.RLS_DN=1
AND ( R.RLS_DN!=1 OR ISNULL(R.RLS_DN) )
AND (E.EMP_NAME = #{assignee} OR R.RLS_EMP_NAME = #{assignee})
AND CONCAT(O.ORD_NO, '') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderNo},'%') AND CONCAT(O.ORD_NO, '') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{strOrderNo},'%')
AND C.CLT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{clientName},'%')
AND O.ORD_SHP_DEST LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shippingDestination},'%')
AND V.V_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{vendorName},'%')
ORDER BY R.RLS_NO, I.ITM_NAME
